hero.subtitle: CHEONAN · BESPOKE · FINE JEWELRY
hero.description: Where the ornate beauty of European Baroque meets modern Korean craftsmanship. Discover your legacy in our private Cheonan-si sanctuary.

about.label: OUR PHILOSOPHY
about.description: Inspired by our signature ivory-embossed galleries, Amaranto offers a serene environment where the brilliance of 24k gold and pearls can be appreciated in silence.

collections.description: From daily essentials in 18k gold to once-in-a-lifetime high jewelry pieces featuring GIA certified stones.
